text: Tommy Thompson (born April 27, 1972) is a former professional American football player who played punter for three seasons for the San Francisco 49ers.Tommy Thompson NFL & AFL Football Statistics - Pro-Football- Reference.com He is married to Nicole Thompson. He has two daughters, Rylee and Ryenn Thompson ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American football punters Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Oregon Ducks football players Category:People from Lompoc, California Category:Players of American football from California
title: Tommy Thompson (punter)
